storyInfo: Toland receives important corporate documents, and Młynar finds him. Realizing that their old friend is planning to assassinate the Leithanian delegate, the two of them resolve to stop him.

attributes.content: Dad's letters are always the same thing, all stiff and serious. You still want me to read it?
'...It is the way of the knight to protect the poor and distraught, but one should be careful with one's companions.'
'Do not let those whom you are tasked to protect suffer with you, nor should you obsess yourself with reforming the wicked and gathering the weak.'
There, he scolded you. Satisfied?
He doesn't think what we're doing is wrong, just futile.
'To save the crops, you must first plough the soil.'
Nov 30th 11:20 P.M.
Village Outside Dzwonek
This humble village sure has been busy these past few days, what with all the knight captains and nobles gracing us with their presence.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Isn't that so, Sir Młynar?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: ...Give the Infected a place to stay. He's accused of instigating the riots.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: I-Is this the safe place that you told me about? You're handing me over to bounty hunters?
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: Don't worry, you're not carrying enough cash to be worth robbing.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: (Nervously touches neck)
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: So if our good knight brought you here, that must mean you must know something.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Do you have family? Do you need to send them a message, tell them to flee?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I, er...
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: Here, pen and paper.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: As for you, Młynar... Ah, I guess you carry that sword around just to annoy folks in the Grand Knight Territory.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Since apparently you don't even need your weapon outside of the city.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: You've got a long line of people queuing up to claim your head in this place alone. Have you gotten so cocky that you thought you could take 'em all out with just a tree branch?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Then why aren't they doing anything? I'm standing right here.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: ...But I entrusted my sword to the campaign knights for maintenance. I'm here for a grave matter, Toland.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: I know, I know, I'm kidding, sheesh. You're picking up your weapon tomorrow, right?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: We would've been so sad over here if you'd forgotten all about us.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: After all, there's no guarantee that you'll be coming back from your meeting with him.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Hey, don't give me that look. And don't tell me you don't suspect anything, either. Why else would you be coming to me about a 'grave matter' at this hour?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: ...What do you know?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Just some educated guesses, but probably not far off what you're thinking.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Why don't we give the poor man some space, though? Let him write home in peace and quiet.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: The night is deep, but the lights at the river valley factories just keep on shining. The former manor of House Paleniskos... brings back memories, doesn't it?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: ...Pardon me, I saw smoke and thought there might be a fire. Did I disturb you?
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: Nothing to worry about, I just threw a few notebooks in there. I suppose burnt leather doesn't smell too nice.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Good to hear it was nothing serious.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: Also, the Craftsman's Guild is asking about the sword.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: ...Leave it for now. It's a shame, but the owner probably won't be back to pick it up for a while.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Yes, sir. All the preparations are ready for the ceremony tomorrow.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: Have a seat while you're here. I'd like to hear your thoughts on the operation.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: But I'm just a junior knight. I'm not sure how useful my input could possibly be.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: Don't worry. I was only a junior knight when the previous captain ordered me to infiltrate Leithanien.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: You've seen and done the most in this operation so far. Your thoughts mean more than anyone else's.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Besides, you're the Knight Primus of House Marek. You're no longer an ordinary knight.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: ...Thank you.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: House Marek prides itself on nurturing true warriors. To my shame, I have yet to have had the chance to bring glory to my family crest.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: ...Forgive me if I'm intruding, but what about you, sir? We've never heard you talk about it.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: I... true, it's something that knights would normally bring up. But the name of the house I serve has not been spoken of in years.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: I'm sorry, I shouldn't have asked.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: No worries. We're just having a chat.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: I used to live around here.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: When I was a child, Dzwonek roamed the borders, standing off against the cities of Leithanien.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Great shadows moved across the wilds when the sun was out. Children who would later become knights used to pretend they were the great heroes of history, arguing over whose wooden spear found the other first.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: That's what brings me nostalgia.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Were the knights of the house killed in battle?
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: No. They committed treason.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: I was the young son of a retainer, without status or position. When the family's collusion with Leithanien was discovered, its title was revoked by the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Wait, do you mean the legend of the Tenebrous Knight? The ringleader of the traitors, House Paleniskos, had gathered a dozen highly-ranked campaign knights, but they were assassinated on the night they planned to carry out their plot.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: But surely the stories are exaggerated? How could anyone defeat so many knights on their own, not to mention the casters from Leithanien?
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: The Tenebrous 'Knight,' hm...
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: I begged the young wanderer who barged into the banquet to show mercy, but no one who was party to the plot was spared.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: I suppose the whole scandal is no longer taboo, now that the dust has settled.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: ...The old captain didn't approve when I was first elected captain, remember?
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: That was because he knew I wasn't willing to give up my life to defend my house's schemes. Instead, I asked for help in trying to stop them.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: As he put it, putting justice above loyalty was a fatal flaw for a campaign knight.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: So... what do you think?
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: I only know about the incident from what you guys told me.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: When the kid brought his friends, the boys were muttering that the noble brat had a trick or two up his sleeves.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: We even made a bet.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: If the rumors that you foiled the Leithanian plot were true, then how about the rumors that the second son of House Nearl was expelled from his house by the war hero Kirill because of gambling debts?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Oh, don't get me wrong, we also bet on when Czcibor would finally put together a flower crown for his Kuranta redhead.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: ...Or when you'd fix that bad habit of always seeing the best in people.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: What kind of person he used to be doesn't matter.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: If the contract you obtained is true, then his plot has cost the lives of countless innocents.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: It's from that little lawyer lady from the Grand Knight Territory. Probably legit.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: To tell the truth, her handing over the documents on her own was an unexpected stroke of luck.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: We were planning to spook her a little bit to get the evidence... and you almost threw a wrench into things.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: As for the documents themselves, I don't think anyone realized their importance.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: According to the sender, she was probably just playing a little legal prank. Just like how we only stopped by because we got a request for help from the village of Twierdza.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: But Czcibor was really interested in it, even going as far as to use the investigation as an excuse to take bounty hunters into custody, just to stop me from questioning her.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Which means that contract, signed by Marek Jr., has nothing to do with his house. It's all the knightclub behind him.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: ...And Gale Industries recruited the Infected as requested, manipulating the media to publicize the attacks.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: The Infected riots are the result of their machinations.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Man, I thought I was close enough to the kid that he'd at least come talk to me first. After all, my buddies definitely have surer hands than those Infected he found.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Do you think those businessmen ever stopped to think about what the campaign knights would have to gain when they're advertising their affiliates?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: ...This is more about more than just causing a panic. They're trying to recreate how the Silverlance Pegasi entered the Grand Knight Territory not too long ago.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: A simple show of force is of no value.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: And given Dzwonek's traditions, the campaign knights don't even have to go so far to find an excuse to enter the city.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Yeah, he wouldn't need to take your sword just for something like that.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: But he did talk about wanting to take revenge for Celina.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: ...I don't owe him an explanation.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Sure, and you're not the only one he's aiming at. But I think there's a reason he set a particular time to return it.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: There's a ribbon-cutting ceremony tomorrow.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Great minds think alike.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Either everything will be over by then, and this keeps you out of it, or that's when it begins, and he wants you there for whatever reason.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Worst case scenario, it's both. Like... making you watch the Leithanian delegate die, right in front of the sculpture representing peace between the two nations.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Enough... he shouldn't be doing this.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Wait, where are you going?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: He shouldn't let these things get to his head, nor should he resort to these underhanded means.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: I'll talk to him.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: ...Sorry, I suppose that was a difficult question.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: I only thought that if the target happened to show up in the slums tonight, perhaps out of the naive logic we've heard from him...
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: I believe that people still capable onto such ideals should not die, even if they are often the first to fall into the maws of fate.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Heh... So why did you sign up for this operation?
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Everyone in the knightclub is of one mind about this.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: We agree that it's time for those who are dreaming away in the safe cocoons of the cities to wake up and face the reality of our struggles and the impending threat.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: Leithanien's ambitions are obvious. Their war preparations have never halted. We should not remain idle while they're preparing to tear away the facade of peace.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: Even if this incident doesn't reignite the flames of war between Kazimierz and Leithanien, the people will remember this time of turmoil.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: They'll understand who it is that truly protects them.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: Ah, that's what I said in my rallying speech, wasn't it?
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Sorry... but we all think the same way.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: If I had to come up with something else... the battlefield is the only place knights can truly find glory.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: We're an unremarkable knightclub stationed on the outskirts, with neither military exploits or a venerable tradition to call our own.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: Most of us come from branches or retainers of the great houses, without the prestigious bloodlines needed to make it into the great knightclubs.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: But as long as we get the chance to set foot on the battlefield, I know we will prove our mettle. We will not allow mere merchants to sell our victory, nor will we cower before the enemy's guns.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: ...If only all of Kazimierz shared our conviction.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: Don't say that... it's our job as knights to go to war.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Let them be weak or fearful. We fight so that they don't have to, and in so doing convince them to put faith in us.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: *cough*...
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Is the wind blowing the smoke into your eyes? Perhaps you should move over here?
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Is that... Captain Celina's diary that you're burning?
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: Yes. I've read it enough times to have it memorized.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: But many of its records are no longer relevant. I wanted to dispose of it, lest it become our shackles in the future.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: ...You're right. We still miss her.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: You know, of course, how that conflict between the nobles disillusioned us with the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: Hard to believe that we lost her to what began as a property dispute in a small village.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: No, it was no complicated political conflict.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Of course, I won't forget those responsible for her death either.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: They simply found an opportunity to exact revenge on us, after many years of waiting.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: We ticked off a lot of people in high places before we joined the campaign knights. They took her life as a warning to me.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Sorry, I didn't mean to pry...
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: No, it was never something that should be left unsaid.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: We wanted to help those struggling to make ends meet under crippling taxes. Those who lost their homes to the G.C.C.'s bulldozers...
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: It's only human to feel sympathy for them.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: We've done nothing to be ashamed of. It was the nobles and merchants who colluded with the media to keep the silence, covering up their crimes.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: It was a silence that should not exist, at least not among knights.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: No knight should ever bow down to wealth and power, but there is no shame in kneeling before suffering.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: ...I'll try to keep that in mind, if I ever get a chance.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: It's easier said than done, given the current state of Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Most who pursue their ideals here find themselves walking not on wide roads and flat terrain, but rather stumbling along the edge of a cliff.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Those who throw themselves bravely into the abyss don't even make a sound.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: ...That's why I'm trying to bring the thunder of war to this land, and carve out a path amidst despair.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: You're going to go find him? Where? The campaign knight camp?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Where else?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: I wrote to him, you know. Anything there is to say, I already did. I don't know if we can still convince him to turn back.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: ...Sitting around and watching this unfold is not an option, Toland.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: I can't stand idly by while he puts all his hopes on war. That's akin to admitting failure.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: ...Disillusionment leads to extreme solutions. It's because we understand that we're angry.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Not at him, though... at the Kazimierz that's driven us all to desperation.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: But even if you wanted to pit yourselves against the entire knightclub, and had the ability to do so... that's why he took your sword.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: There's nothing stopping me from trying to dissuade him.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: —Why do you think the hunters were so willing to follow you back then?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: You don't have to make enemies of the campaign knights.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: And you don't have to be so reckless.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I know what you're concerned about, of course.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: It's certainly harder for us to make a move when our brothers are still in their hands, and we could hardly expect to go head-to-head with campaign knights.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: But it's sad enough for Czcibor to have gone rogue on us. Can't you at least give me the hope that not all knights are like that?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I didn't like how my father saw things. Who decides who's the farmer, and who are the crops?
Who decides they could push crops into the earth to make it more fertile?
...No, I won't write this in the letter. A knight should not question endlessly, not without finding an answer into which he can place his trust.
But I'll always remember the questions.
...I mean, I won't stop you if you still want to go have a chat with him. I'll just sit here lamenting how friendships change.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: But really think about it.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Boss.
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: The Leithanian noble is heading out quietly with his bodyguard.
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Now?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: They want to flee Kazimierz at this juncture? Foolish.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: They will not elude the campaign knights.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Looks like we're running out of time to talk this out.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I came to meet up with a few new business partners. I ought to give them a heads-up before defecation encounters ventilation. It wouldn't do to get them killed in this mess.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I have a grave matter to talk about, Toland.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Protect the Leithanian.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: ...Deal.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Any way we choose, as long as we can delay the campaign knights, right?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Then we do this my way, as usual.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I'm going to find Czcibor.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: You've never turned your back on anything that you felt was right, never mind putting it on a scale.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: One last question, then.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: You're not expecting to this to end peacefully, are you?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: The night wind is chilling, and the only sound in the darkness is the rushing river.
The factories stand quietly in the river valley, their massive steel silhouettes illuminated by their lights.
People still believe they can bring back the sunset, a time when blood and fire had warmth, when there was a long path ahead of them.
Now, though, there is no time to reminisce.
No time for nostalgia, or anger at all that has changed.
Młynar extends his hand.
'Give me a sword.'
Affirmative. Target is on the expressway towards the city exit.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: He couldn't even wait until tomorrow's ceremony... knowing full well that a diplomatic incident would ensue.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Should we take control of the gates and stop the target from leaving?
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: Is anyone else monitoring him?
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: The only people nearby are two homeless sleeping on the streets.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: Commandeer the foreign visitor gate. Call it a security checkpoint.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: ...Excuse me.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: A runner just brought urgent orders.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: They're... signed by the Grand Knight herself.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: The entire knightclub has been ordered to withdraw from Dzwonek immediately and report to the Grand Knight Territory.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight
